pkgmetadata.longdescription: Subnet Utilities================This is a Python module for manipulating subnet information. It adds usefulutilities to the built-in Python `ipaddress` library. It requires Python 3+and supports both IPv4 and IPv6 subnets.Example usage-------------Create a subnet object:: from subnet import ip_network, IPv4Network, IPv6Network # The simple way takes either IPv4 or IPv6 CIDR notation my_subnet = ip_network('10.10.0.0/16') # The specific type way my_ipv4_subnet = IPv4Network('10.10.0.0/16') my_ipv6_subnet = IPv6Network('fd3e:48fe:59b2:43ca::/64')Divide a subnet into useful chunks (as evenly as plausible):: for subnet in my_ipv4_subnet.divide(6): print(subnet) for subnet in my_ipv6_subnet.divide(2): print(subnet)Get a random ip from a subnet:: print(my_subnet.random_ip())Command line usage------------------It is also possible to perform various tasks from the command line directly:: $ network-divide 10.0.0.0/8 4 $ network-random-ip fd3e:48fe:59b2:43ca::/64 $ network-info 192.168.0.0/24
